name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ⧸ Amane Kanata AnimeSong 3DLIVE 【#天音かなた爆誕2024 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [lVQlIvUr5Dc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Seishoujo Ryouiki' featuring Amane Kanata, Nakiri Ayame, AZKi, and La+ Darknesss.
MC segment where Kanata thanks the guests and introduces her next song.
Performance of the original song 'Oracle' by Amane Kanata.

subtitles.original: 呪文めいたその言葉 愛なんて
subtitles.english: That word that sounds like a spell... "Love"...

subtitles.original: 鎖のように重い
subtitles.english: is heavy as a chain.

subtitles.original: 甘やかして撫でるより
subtitles.english: Rather than spoiling and petting me...

subtitles.original: どんな覚悟もできるならば
subtitles.english: if you can make any kind of resolve...

subtitles.original: 震える唇で蜜を摘む
subtitles.english: With trembling lips, plucking nectar...

subtitles.original: 狩人のときめき
subtitles.english: is the hunter's thrill.

subtitles.original: この深い胸の奥底を
subtitles.english: If you have the courage

subtitles.original: 射抜く勇気があるのならば
subtitles.english: to shoot through the depths of this heart...

subtitles.original: あなた捕まえただけじゃ
subtitles.english: I didn't just catch you.

subtitles.original: 逃がさないようにして
subtitles.english: I'll make sure you can't escape.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで
subtitles.english: Yes! So...

subtitles.original: 百鬼先輩、AZKiちゃん、そしてラプラスが来てくれました！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Nakiri-senpai, AZKi-chan, and La+ came to perform! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ということで、次の曲はオリジナル曲を歌いたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So, for the next song, I'd like to sing an original song!

subtitles.original: 今日このライブのあとにアニメーションMVが投稿される...
subtitles.english: After this live today, an animation MV will be posted...

subtitles.original: おらくる！
subtitles.english: Oracle!

subtitles.original: みんなー！まだまだ盛り上がれますかー！？
subtitles.english: Everyone! Can you still get hyped up!?

subtitles.original: あともう少しでこのライブも終わってしまいます！
subtitles.english: This live will be over in just a bit more!

subtitles.original: 最後まで全力出して盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped up with all our strength until the end!

subtitles.original: ヒトヒトで埋まった商店街賑わってた
subtitles.english: The shopping district was bustling with crowds of people.

subtitles.original: 追い込んじゃったんだ
subtitles.english: I've been backed into a corner.

subtitles.original: チカチカって真っ赤な電灯消そうか
subtitles.english: Shall we turn off the flickering, bright red light?

subtitles.original: 運んでいた いなくなっちゃったった
subtitles.english: It was carrying... now they're all gone.

subtitles.original: カンカランとカンカラ鳴った信号が鳴ってた
subtitles.english: The signal went 'clink-clank' and rang out.

subtitles.original: 突っ立っちゃってんだ
subtitles.english: I'm just standing there.

subtitles.original: フラフラと真っ青なお面そやつ連れてないですか
subtitles.english: Staggering with a bright blue mask, don't you have that guy with you?

subtitles.original: あれあれ聞こえますか それ吐き出しちゃいますか どうぞ
subtitles.english: Hey hey, can you hear? Shall we spit it out? Go ahead.

subtitles.original: 欠陥品と嘲笑して ろくでなしと見下して
subtitles.english: Mocked as a defective product, looked down on as a scoundrel...

subtitles.original: あの日けなした壊滅は自分の方でした
subtitles.english: The one I ridiculed that day... it was actually me who was destroyed.

subtitles.original: あらあら剥いて だんだん希望になれ
subtitles.english: Peel it off, bit by bit, and become hope.

subtitles.original: 根本的な良い子になるまで愛してあげるね
subtitles.english: I'll love you until you become a good child at your core.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 強欲で満たして ぶつぶつに恋で肥やして
subtitles.english: It's okay, fill it with greed, and fatten it up with fragmented love.

subtitles.original: 骨の髄まで ちゃんと奥まで ちゃんと愛愛愛ラブユー
subtitles.english: To the marrow of your bones, deep inside... truly love, love, love, I love you.

subtitles.original: 足りない 足りない こっち足りない ママに甘えちゃって
subtitles.english: Not enough, not enough, not enough over here. Being pampered by Mama.

subtitles.original: 愛しいね 可愛いね おめめに映った有象無象が全部理想
subtitles.english: How dear, how cute. All the rabble reflected in those eyes is ideal.

subtitles.original: 君が遣わした言の葉まさに 撫で撫でしてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll give those words you sent a nice headpat.

subtitles.original: こっちおいで愛お上手だね （へっほっえっほっ）
subtitles.english: Come here, you're so good at loving. (He-ho-e-ho)

subtitles.original: やらねばね 息が吸えたね 息が吐けたね 一人きりで今日もお過ごしてね
subtitles.english: Gotta do it, right? You could breathe in, you could breathe out. Spending another day all alone.

subtitles.original: 意味が上手だね 口が上手だね 泣いた顔もキュンときちゃって
subtitles.english: You're so good at meanings, so good with words. Even your crying face makes my heart flutter.

subtitles.original: あぁ、君の存在から放たれたすべてが間違いだし正しいし有り得ないぐらいもう愛しくて愛しくて堪らないんだけど、多分１％も伝わらないからこれからも君の上から、いくらでもいくらでもいくらでも注いであげるからね、ちゅー
subtitles.english: Ah, everything released from your existence is wrong yet right, and I love it so much I can't stand it, but since probably not even 1% gets across, from now on, I'll pour it over you from above, as much as I want, as much as I want, as much as I want, mwah.

subtitles.original: しゃーないね しゃーないね 君のせいじゃないもんね
subtitles.english: It's inevitable, it's inevitable. It's not your fault, is it?

subtitles.original: しゃーないね しゃーないね ねんねしたいよね もういっちょ
subtitles.english: It's inevitable, it's inevitable. You want to go night-night, right? One more time.

subtitles.original: しゃーないね しゃーないね 泣いても泣いても来ないね
subtitles.english: It's inevitable, it's inevitable. No matter how much you cry, no one comes.

subtitles.original: しゃーないね しゃーないね 誰も返事しないもんね あー
subtitles.english: It's inevitable, it's inevitable. No matter who you cry to, no one answers. Ah...

subtitles.original: あらあら もうそんな傷つけたりしないで
subtitles.english: Oh dear, don't hurt them like that anymore.

subtitles.original: こんなバケモノだらけの世界に生んじゃってごめんね
subtitles.english: Sorry for bringing you into this world full of monsters.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 安全圏に行こうね 安心な世界に行こうね
subtitles.english: It's okay, let's go to the safe zone. Let's go to a peaceful world.

subtitles.original: 居させないから ずっと今日も 一緒
subtitles.english: I won't let you stay there, always, today too, together.

subtitles.original: あらあら剥いて だんだん希望になれ
subtitles.english: Peel it off, bit by bit, and become hope.

subtitles.original: 根本的な善になるまで愛してあげるね
subtitles.english: I'll love you until you become a good person at your core.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 強欲で満たして ぶつぶつに恋で肥やして
subtitles.english: It's okay, fill it with greed, and fatten it up with fragmented love.

subtitles.original: 忘れちゃうから 笑っちゃうから ちゃんと愛愛愛ラブユー
subtitles.english: Since you'll forget, since you'll laugh... truly love, love, love, I love you.
